scripts.pre-release: npm run build && zip -r chrome-to-roam.zip dist/*
scripts.release:major: npm run pre-release && npm version major && git add chrome-to-roam.zip && git commit -m 'Build and dist update for major release' && git push origin main --tags && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") chrome-to-roam.zip --title 'Release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")' --notes 'Major release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")'
scripts.release:minor: npm run pre-release && npm version minor && git add chrome-to-roam.zip && git commit -m 'Build and dist update for minor release' && git push origin main --tags && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") chrome-to-roam.zip --title 'Release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")' --notes 'Minor release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")'
scripts.release:patch: npm run pre-release && npm version patch && git add chrome-to-roam.zip && git commit -m 'Build and dist update for patch release' && git push origin main --tags && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") chrome-to-roam.zip --title 'Release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")' --notes 'Patch release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")'
